name: Basic Bread Pudding II
author: Marc Boyer
summary: This bread pudding is very versatile and lovely in texture. Christmas time can inspire a bread pudding by simply substituting a good-quality eggnog for the milk (or part of it). Also add a pinch of nutmeg and mace to produce a sumptuous holiday dessert. Otherwise, enjoy this just as it is with a dollop of whipped cream.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf white bread, torn into small pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large mixing bowl, pour hot milk over bread
Stir egg mixture into the bread mixture and blend well
Melt the margarine and pour into a 9x13-inch pan
Bake for 40 minutes, or until firm and golden brown
